item.title: Diversity Is Really Freaking Hard
item.description: Background I’m going to discuss an important topic that affects everybody in tech: diversity. No, this won’t be some preachy post about how diversity is great and how you should be a better human being.

item.title: How To Guarantee Dev Team Failure
item.description: The Problem I think that most devs would agree when I state that the definition of success in the corporate world of development places less emphasis on “good” code and more emphasis on “working” code.
